about_the_game:
Gather and choose adventurers by using your math skills to grow your army in this auto-battler to defeat all enemies through the world of Calculon.

Story

Travel through the land while gathering adventurers and defeating enemies, move through the world to finally face the ogre king.

Challenges

Play challenge mode using multiple difficulty settings with an optional automatic difficulty adjustment. Try to set the highest scores.

Skills

Improve your adventurers by acquiring skills. Improve their attack speed, damage and hitpoints with each skill point you earn by leveling up.

  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 / AMD R9 270X
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

  • OS: Ubuntu 24.04
  • Processor: 2.5 Ghz Quad Core CPU
